explanation: [0-0] A little boy in blue pajamas and a man in a red short-sleeved shirt are sitting on the floor. The boy is holding a cucumber in his right hand, his eyes looking down, with a bit of black sauce on the corner of his mouth. The man in red puts the cucumber in the bowl on the floor with his right hand and looks at his phone with his left hand.

[0-4] The man in red dips the cucumber in the sauce in the bowl, takes a bite, his eyes fixed on the phone screen. Next to him, the little boy also dips his cucumber in the sauce, takes a bite, and then the man dips the cucumber in the sauce again and takes a bite.
